ResumeParserData.Experience: Barclays Bank Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2019 - Present  Leading a team of analysts in conducting enhanced due diligence (EDD) on politically exposed persons (PEPs) and high-risk clients. Responsible for identifying, assessing, and mitigating financial crime risks to ensure regulatory compliance and protect the bank's reputation.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducting comprehensive EDD on high-risk clients, including PEPs, and documenting findings.  Analyzing complex financial transactions to detect suspicious activities and potential risks.  Collaborating with compliance and legal teams to ensure adherence to AML regulations and internal policies.  Developing and implementing risk assessment frameworks to evaluate the risk level of new and existing clients.  Training junior analysts on risk assessment methodologies and compliance procedures.  Preparing detailed reports and presenting findings to senior management and regulatory bodies.  Staying updated on the latest AML regulations and best practices to enhance the bank's compliance framework.  HSBC Bank PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2016 - 2019  Performed due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Identified potential financial crime risks and provided recommendations to mitigate them. Ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducting EDD on high-risk clients and documenting the findings in detailed reports.  Monitoring and analyzing client transactions to identify unusual patterns and potential risks.  Collaborating with internal stakeholders to ensure effective risk management and compliance.  Assisting in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.  Preparing and submitting reports to regulatory bodies as required.  Participating in regular training sessions to stay updated on regulatory changes and industry best practices.  Lloyds Banking Group AML Analyst  Manchester, UK  2014 - 2016  Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence on new and existing clients. Assisted in identifying and mitigating financial crime risks and ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducting due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential risks.  Analyzing client transactions for signs of money laundering and other financial crimes.  Assisting in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.  Preparing reports on findings and recommendations for senior management.  Collaborating with other departments to ensure a holistic approach to risk management.

JobProfile.Title: Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading a team of analysts in conducting enhanced due diligence (EDD) on politically exposed persons (PEPs) and high-risk clients. Responsible for identifying, assessing, and mitigating financial crime risks to ensure regulatory compliance and protect the bank's reputation. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducting comprehensive EDD on high-risk clients, including PEPs, and documenting findings. 
 Analyzing complex financial transactions to detect suspicious activities and potential risks. 
 Collaborating with compliance and legal teams to ensure adherence to AML regulations and internal policies. 
 Developing and implementing risk assessment frameworks to evaluate the risk level of new and existing clients. 
 Training junior analysts on risk assessment methodologies and compliance procedures. 
 Preparing detailed reports and presenting findings to senior management and regulatory bodies. 
 Staying updated on the latest AML regulations and best practices to enhance the bank's compliance framework.

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Performed due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Identified potential financial crime risks and provided recommendations to mitigate them. Ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducting EDD on high-risk clients and documenting the findings in detailed reports. 
 Monitoring and analyzing client transactions to identify unusual patterns and potential risks. 
 Collaborating with internal stakeholders to ensure effective risk management and compliance. 
 Assisting in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures. 
 Preparing and submitting reports to regulatory bodies as required. 
 Participating in regular training sessions to stay updated on regulatory changes and industry best practices.

JobProfile.Title: AML Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: anti-money-laundering- analyst, analyst, anti money laundering compliance, aml investigator, analyst aml compliance, analyst anti-money laundering, analyst of anti money laundering, analyst, aml compliance, analyst, aml compl risk management, fraud and aml analyst, analyst - aml compliance, analyst, aml investigations, anti-money laundering analyst, aml compliance analyst, aml surveillance analyst, aml analyst, analyst anti money laundering, aml investigations specialist

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence on new and existing clients. Assisted in identifying and mitigating financial crime risks and ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducting due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential risks. 
 Analyzing client transactions for signs of money laundering and other financial crimes. 
 Assisting in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures. 
 Preparing reports on findings and recommendations for senior management. 
 Collaborating with other departments to ensure a holistic approach to risk management.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Detail-oriented and highly analytical PEP & High Risk Analyst with 8 years of experience in the banking sector. Expertise in conducting thorough due diligence, identifying and mitigating financial crime risks, and ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements. Proven ability to manage high-risk client portfolios and provide actionable insights to mitigate potential threats.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Emily has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Financial Analysts and Advisors. 'The candidate has a total experience of 8 YearsThe candidate has been working as a Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst at Barclays Bank for the last 5.7 years.
